rules_text: Chronicle [i](As this enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Stop after III.)[/i]
special_text:
Chronicle [i](As this enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Stop after III.)[/i]
[Lore I-II] You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
[Lore III] Create a token that’s a copy of another target creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
notes:
Add RR. Until end of turn, you don’t lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Target opponent may sacrifice a permanent. If they don’t, draw a card.
Exile up to one target creature. Its controller exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a creature card, then puts that card onto the battlefield.
CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls. It can’t block this turn.
